title: Unspecified Error Occurred
body:
**_"Unspecified Error Occurred. Please Check the logs for more information"_**

I uninstalled the game and reinstalled it, though every time league opens to check through the files I would immediately get hit with this error message.

It wont even go past 0% or even through 1 file while updating. I can't do anything but is there any case that it was this update that came out suddenly? Do I have to wait for the next patch before I can play at all? I want to understand why it is suddenly happening.

replies.body: It sounds like your patcher is attempting to scan files, but a setting or permisisons problem is blocking it.  We have a [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide that I recommend going over, which should get you all fixed up.  Hope that helps!
